resources.string: E' necessario riavviare per applicare il tweak
Potrebbe non funzionare su tutti i dispositivi
Nessuna app per mail trovata. Per favore installane una dal Play Store
Assicurati che il dito copra l'intero scanner
Non potrai acquistare fino a quando non rimuovi app come Freedom, Lucky Patcher o altri cheat
Non potrai ripristinare gli acquisti fino a quando non rimuoverai app quali Freedom, Lucky Patcher o altri cheat
Non potrai fare test su questa build, benchè meno usare una versione ricompilata.
Non hai i permessi per testare questa build.
Non hai permessi per effettuare acquisti su questa build. Se vuoi, puoi installare una versione firmata da Google Play Store
Il nome package modificato di Androoster non è accettato e non puoi avviare build modificate.
Androoster necessita l'accesso root per funzionare.\nAssicurati di avere permesso il root a Androoster, questa app non funziona altrimenti
Impossibile ottenere l'accesso root, riavvia Androoster se possiedi il root
Impossibile accedere a Busybox, Androoster richiede speciali applet per funzionare.\nInstallalo dal Play Store e riapri Androoster
Questo dispositivo non supporta la visualizzazione web, necessaria per visualizzare il changelog. Una componente del sistema è mancante.
L'ultima versione di Androoster (%s) è già installata
Un nuovo update di test è disponibile!
Questa versione contiene problemi che sono risolti nell'ultima, %s.\nScaricala dal Google Play store il prima possibile
Androoster %s è disponibile, aggiorna per avere le ultime funzionalità e bugfix
Androoster %s è ora sul Play store, portando le ultime funzionalità e bugfix
Androoster %s (Beta) è ora sul Play store, portando le ultime funzionalità e bugfix per i testers
Androoster %s è %v versione avanti alla versione ufficiale. Ottimo lavoro!
Androoster %s è %v versioni avanti alla versione ufficiale. Ottimo lavoro!
Impossibile controllare al momento gli aggiornamenti, il dispositivo non ha una connessione a Internet
Impossibile controllare gli aggiornamenti senza di esso, potresti riceverli da un software di terze parti
Non sarà possibile ricevere update in futuro
\nTi raccomandiamo di non ignorarlo e di aggiornare il prima possibile
Chiudi tutti i processi in background e libera memoria
Abbiamo appena chiuso processi e sincronizzato i cambiamenti sul disco
Fatto! Per vedere i risultati, è necessario riavviare il dispositivo
Errore nell'aggiornamento della lista backup. Elimina i dati app e riprova
I tuoi tweak sono stati applicati con successo al sistema
One of the most used governor on linux old times: when your device is getting overloaded the CPU frequenzy will be ported at its max. Now it\'s getting replaced by interactive
Little improvements at the basic ondemand governor
The CPU is always set to its maximum frequency
The CPU is always set to its minimum frequency
It slightly raises CPU performances when needed. Useful on old devices, reduced performances and amplified battery life
The frequency is decided by the applications that are in execution
Just uses max and min frequencies for handling the cpu, no middle ones
Default and best governor for most of the devices. Cpu frequency switch are ruled by a timer and user interaction
Custom kernel governor, not recognized by Androoster
Changes are applied, but them will take effect if you wipe dalvik cache and reboot now. Else new profile will be applied per-app
Xposed can give some problems, proceed with caution.
Boosts CPU when you need power and reduce it when unnecessary
Modifies internal system parameters to make apps smoother and lag-free
Tunes CPU performances to have a faster execution, uses a bit of extra battery
If the governor is not applied is because your kernel does not support it\nThe current governor is shown in the table here above
Choose the option that you like the most and let us to think about everything else
Android automatically cleans-up memory from unused services, processes and tasks
Keep memory fresh and as free as possible, to make everything fluid. May reduce battery
Tweaks to make scroll and navigation cleaner, smoother and responsive
Android memory manager that automatically manages memory, here you can change the profile
Enable native memory packaging (zram) to gain device general better performances
Always keep launcher in memory to avoid reloads and have a fast experience on the home screen
Not enough memory to activate the selected profile
Already wiped, this action should be performed once per month
Your device statistics will be cleaned and your battery will gain a better duration
Your device has not reached 100% of total charge. Deleting battery statistics now may harm the operative system. Continue or wait until full recharge?
Kills background services that are cpu-draining
Optimizes android default settings to have less battery drain
Android uses this value to scan for new WiFi networks. The higher, the better for battery life
Uses lett battery when the screen is off
Enables built-in fast charging (Works only for devices that support fast charging)
Enables built-in fast wireless charging (Works only for devices that support fast charging)
Apply a large set of tweaks to maximize performances
Tweaks the way your phone handles processes
Disables device extended JNI checks to execute tasks faster
If active, when the kernel crashes the device auto reboots after a timeout
Defines how many seconds your device waits in case of crash
Restarts the device if a system operation crashes. Not recommended
Maximum number of threads the device can allocate for a single task/application
Error, your device does not support this tweak
Auto reboot delay now is %s seconds
Force using google\' dns servers for faster connection
Enlarge buffers to speed up downloads and uploads
Extra buffer tweaks for mobile connections
Select the best IPV4 algorithm settings to make network a little bit more fast
The hostname is your local network device name. You can see that if you scan your current network
Make calls at the best quality tweaking AMR audio codec
Enable fast dormancy on supported carriers
Use wideband to make connections faster
Allows your screen to display more content
If buttons are on, more battery will be wasted
Using unappropriated numbers may break your device
Enables 16-bit transparency, it may have UI modification but it will make GPU-bound tasks smoother
Force all apps to support Hardware Acceleration for better performances
Optimize your disk behavior trimming blocks which are not used by the filesystem
Boost every I/O operation on the system partition
Boost every I/O operation on the data partition
Set the max available speed for sd cards if there are any
Makes every filesystem partitions as an ext4 one to gain speed on I/O
Filesystems are now mounted as ext4
Filesystems already mounted with the best settings
Checking for fstrim on your system...
fstrim is not installed on your system
Mounting all filesystems in the device root as ext4...
Clean up and manage your storage with the #1 tool on the Android market
Clean up your system from unused files
Heavily improves drawing operations performances by adjusting some systemui flags
Forces applications to enable native support to hardware acceleration
Current DPI is %dpi, reboot to apply!
Enables system (secured) compiled libraries forfaster streaming
Draw 2D layers using GPU. It lightens CPU tasks
Always extract the best-quality JPEG image (Gallery, websites, etc). It will use a little more ram
Enable debug mode when USB is connected
Do not show the notification when your device is connected with usb
Disable built in tracking, saving speed and battery
Adjust parameter to handle with less resources internal debug services
Allow OEM unlock, useful if you want to install custom recoveries, root and everything else
Disables runtime memory checks to make app execution faster
Disabling can help performances when your devices encounter an oom crash
Disable general system security mechanism to improve performances
Allow installation of apps from sources other than the play store
Install applications using ADB without verifying packages
The Global Positioning System (GPS) is a satellite-based radionavigation system that provides geolocation and time information to a GPS receiver anywhere on or near the Earth
Allow apps to generate a fake position for this device
Sleep mode disabled, device won\'t go in sleep state
Aggressive Sleep Mode, device will minimize battery usage in stand-by
Medium Sleep Mode, device will only keep running core processes
Light mode, the default Android sleep mode
For the dialogs library and some other great stuff
For this beautiful page and the Theme Engine
If you like Androoster let a good review
You will find the anweres for your questions about Androoster here
Report bugs or request new features
From the Google Play Store server
Jump in the Settings app\'s page
Help us translating Androoster and get back a promotion code to evaluate your version for free
May harm/interfere with the operations of some root-applications, but it will drastically improve boot time (Turn on if you know what you are doing)
The maximus number of touches that the system can handle
Your phone will ring as soon as it will get the call
We cannot start Androoster because we are missing some permissions. If you want to use Androoster you can allow them and then we will start up for you
Restoring workspace and encryption at the default state...
The hint cannot contain the pin
The hint cannot contain the password
No authentication needed to unlock Androoster
Fingerprint will be used as primary login method
No registered fingerprints on this device
An accent color for the theme
Toast color will always be the same
Theme toast basing on their content
Toast color will always be the accent color
Error while communicating with the store
Google Play Store is not installed and you cannot purchase the pro version
You have already bought the pro version
An android native, super-reactive and lightning-fast operative system tweaker
Androoster will require root access to execute the available tweaks
Every tweak is instantly applied. however to feel the result you have to reboot your device after editing the values
Every tweak is reversible, you can easily manage backups in the apposite section
Also if this app is 100% secure, make sure to know what you are doing. I won\'t be responsible for any kind of issue you may meet on your way
